title: Repo sync

details: Added new documentation page for disabling/restricting pull requests in repository settings
Added CTA tracking parameters (`ref_product`, `ref_type`, `ref_style`) to links across code security documentation

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
